title: Chicken with apricot sauce
ingredients: ['0.75-1kg skinless chicken breast fillets, diced', '1 large onion', '400ml apricot juice', '1 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger', '1/2 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '1/2 teaspoon Moroccan style seasoning', '1 (410g) tin apricot halves in juice, halved, juice reserved', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', 'olive oil for cooking']
